n, m: nat

m + S n = S n + m

```coq

Qed.```

- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

```coq
intros q.
exists q.
split.
- apply plus_n_O.
- eapply out_code_inv in H.
  destruct H as [c [l [H1 [H2 H3]]]].
  eapply sc_inv in H0.
  destruct H0 as [c' [l' [H4 [H5 H6]]]].
  eapply code_start_eq in H1.
  eapply code_start_eq in H4.
  rewrite H1 in H4.
  inversion H4.
  eapply out_code_cons in H2.
  eapply out_code_cons in H5.
  eapply P//st1-[p]->st2 in H3.
  eapply Q//st1-[k]->st3 in H6.
  eauto.
Qed.

original: intros q. exists q. split. - apply plus_n_O. - eapply out_code_inv in H. destruct H as [c [l [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. eapply sc_inv in H0. destruct H0 as [c' [l' [H4 [H5 H6]]]]. eapply code_start_eq in H1. eapply code_start_eq in H4. rewrite H1 in H4. inversion H4. eapply out_code_cons in H2. eapply out_code_cons in H5.
